personal.name: Viraj Chikhale
personal.subtitle: Final Year AI Engineering Student & Aspiring Data Scientist
personal.bio: Highly motivated final year engineering student with expertise in data analysis, programming, and a passion for applying data science techniques to solve real-world problems. Currently pursuing Artificial Intelligence at Savitribai Phule Pune University with a CGPA of 9.19.

projects.title: Amazon Sales Analysis
projects.description: Comprehensive Tableau report providing insights into textile sales on Amazon, featuring state-wise and category-wise profit analysis with interactive map visualizations.

projects.title: Rubik's Cube Solver
projects.description: Arduino-based intelligent robot that scans and solves Rubik's Cube using A* algorithm, featuring servo motors, computer vision, and Android app integration with 3D-printed components.

projects.title: AI Tic Tac Toe Game
projects.description: Hardware-based AI game using Arduino, MiniMax algorithm, and touchscreen display with real-time decision making, sensor inputs, and interactive GUI.

projects.title: Gram Panchayat Web App
projects.description: Complete web application for local government management with user authentication, data management, and administrative features.

services.title: Data Analysis & Visualization
services.description: Expert data analysis using Python, Pandas, and Tableau to extract insights and create compelling visualizations.

services.title: Machine Learning Solutions
services.description: Developing ML models using Scikit-learn and Python for predictive analytics and intelligent automation.

services.title: Full Stack Development
services.description: End-to-end web application development using modern technologies and best practices.

services.title: IoT Development
services.description: Arduino-based IoT solutions with sensor integration, hardware programming, and mobile app connectivity.

experience.description: Gained comprehensive experience with Tableau development and data visualization techniques.
achievements: Mastered Tableau including data cleaning and preprocessing
Created interactive dashboards and data visualization sheets
Worked with complex datasets to extract meaningful insights

experience.description: Developed complete web applications and gained industry experience in full-stack development.
achievements: Built comprehensive Gram Panchayat web application
Implemented user authentication and data management systems
Utilized modern web technologies including PHP, MySQL, and Ajax

education.degree: Bachelor of Engineering in Artificial Intelligence
